bib.title: WordnetLoom: a graph-based visual wordnet development framework
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej and Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l} and Musia{\l}, Adam and Ramocki, Rados{\l}aw and Maziarz, Marek
bib.abstract: The paper presents WordnetLoom-a new version of an application supporting the development of the Polish wordnet called plWordNet. The primary user interface of WordnetLoom is a graph-based, graphical, active presentation of wordnet structure. Linguist can directly work on the structure of synsets linked by relation links. The new version is compared with the previous one in order to show the lines of development and to illustrate the introduced difference. A new version of WordnetWeaver-a tool supporting semi
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the International Multiconference on Computer Science and Information Technology
